titleStmt.title: An elegie upon the death of the Reverend Mr. Thomas Shepard, late teacher of the church at Charlstown in New-England: / By a great admirer of his worth, and true mourner for his death.
titleStmt.author: Oakes, Urian, 1631-1681.
